title: News: Stream Panda Bear’s Tomboy
content:
After a record such as Person Pitch, the anticipation for the follow up, Tomboy, was always going to be huge. The record will drop on April 12, but as of this morning you won’t have to wait that long, as NPR have to decided to stream it on their website. Not a bad Monday afternoon surprise right? Click the link bellow to check the LP out.

Panda Bear’s Tomboy
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
